title: Dreadnova Darius
body:
Hi all,

I may be out of touch, but wasn't the new Darius and Lee Sin skin meant to be released this patch?
Is there a later release date for these, or is that going to be a second 7.7 update?

Any comments would be helpful

Thanks!

replies.body: I'm still waiting... I mean, God Fist is out, it's been days and days. Still can't turn gems into it.

Most skins aren't released with the release of the actual patch cycle, but tend to come a few days after. I believe (but don't quote me on this) that the idea is to make sure there aren't any gamebreaking bugs with the basic patch before activating extra cosmetics that could also have problems once shipped to live. Basically it's to ensure that if there's a leak in the boat, it's only one or two that can be fixed up, instead of the whole boat bottom just going bye bye.
